author: kwright
msg: Add a test for throttling that will hopefully reassure us there is no problem with this functionality.  Part of CONNECTORS-679.

author: jmhsieh
msg: HBASE-8381 TestTableInputFormatScan on Hadoop 2 fails because YARN kills our applications
This patch bumps up the vmem-pmem ratio so that yarn's resource checker does not kill jobs that exceed the vmem (virtual memory!) allocation limit.  Related to HBASE-6330.

author: kturner
msg: ACCUMULO-1330 patch from Corey Nolet which specifies units in du help command
